item.title: github: Copilot Content Exclusion REST API in public preview
item.description:
GitHub Copilot adds a new Content Exclusion REST API (JSON) in public preview for organization and enterprise admins to manage Copilot content exclusion rules programmatically.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: 2025 REST API for Azure Database for PostgreSQL
item.description:
Azure announced the general availability of the 2025 REST API for Azure Database for PostgreSQL, adding support for PostgreSQL 17 and 18 so you can adopt those versions without changing automation patterns; the release also includes the ability to set a default database.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: Dependabot alerts API offset-based pagination parameters deprecated
item.description:
GitHub has removed offset-based pagination parameters (page, first, last) from all Dependabot alerts REST API endpoints; only cursor-based parameters (before, after, per_page) are supported going forward.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: A REST API for GitHub Projects, sub-issues improvements, and more
item.description:
GitHub announced a REST API for GitHub Projects so developers can read and manage project data programmatically, plus enhancements to sub-issues to make breaking down work easier and other related improvements.

  • Source: GitHub
